      • addEdgeBetween

        public int addEdgeBetween(int identifier,
                          MoleculeAtom source,
                          MoleculeAtom target)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMapGraph
        Adds a new edge with the given identifier to the graph, connecting source and target nodes. This method also references source and target as neighbors to each other.
        Specified by:
        addEdgeBetween in interface Graph<MoleculeAtom,MoleculeBond,java.lang.Integer>
        Specified by:
        addEdgeBetween in class AbstractMapGraph<MoleculeAtom,MoleculeBond,Vector2D,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        identifier - The edge identifier.
        source - The source node.
        target - The target node.
        Returns:
        The identifier of the added edge.
